thread.title: Watch President Trump Announce His Supreme Court Nominee Live
thread.title_full: Watch President Trump Announce His Supreme Court Nominee Live

author: Colin Stutz
title: Watch President Trump Announce His Supreme Court Nominee Live
text:
Ron Sachs-Pool/Getty Images President Donald TrumpÂ at the White House on Jan. 23, 2017 in Washington, DC.Â 
President Donald Trump will announce his nominee for Supreme Court Justice on Tuesday (Jan. 31) at 8 p.m. EST live around the world. 
Trump's rumored pick to fill a vacancy left by the late Justice Antonin Scalia last year is 49-year-old Judge Neil Gorsuch. 
Gorsuch currently presides over the 10th Circuit Court of Appeals and has been likened to Scalia for his interpretation of the Constitution and writing style. 
Watch the Facebook live stream here:
